name: JUICE (Crawlspace)
description:
DRINK JUICE DRINK JUICE DRINK JUICE this is a game about drinking juice sometimes all I want to do is drink juice any kind of juice will do, I'm not so picky, I promise orange, kiwi, mango, carrot, ginger, beet, plum everyone kind of juice is welcome if that sounds you like at all, maybe try this game

*web version is full of graphical ghosts and specters, play at your own risk or just pls download the desktop version

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ CONTROLS ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

mouse click - drink juice

mouse drag - move juice

space - creates new juice carton

HINT: if you're having trouble filling the glass, maybe trying making a ~lot~ of cartons really quickly...

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ CREDITS ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

art and programming - @small_signs

sounds - @soundletters

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

thanks for drinking

crawlspace ~ 2018
